entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:33 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle near noon. Showers beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
